MEDELLIN, COLOMBIA

4 DAYS/3 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”3px||39px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”30px|0px|40px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

Itinerary

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”|auto||175px||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Note: Check our Bogotá and San Andrés packages and maybe add it to your trip and create your own adventure.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”|auto||175px||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

DAY 01: MEDELLIN

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Reception at the airport, transfer to a city hotel.

Accommodation in the selected hotel.

Rest of the day at leisure.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” width=”81.8%” min_height=”288px” custom_margin=”|auto||175px||” custom_padding=”||0px|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 02: CITY AND GRAFFITI TOUR

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

 Breakfast at the hotel

City tour of Medellín visiting the Pueblito Paisa, the park of the barefoot, Botero Park, Metro and Metro cable. We will visit the only neighborhood in the World that has electric stairs as a public transport method and the neighborhood Comuna 13.

Back to the hotel.

           

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” width=”81.4%” custom_margin=”|auto||175px||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 03: MEDELLIN – GUATAPE – MEDELLIN

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Early departure to Guatapé a beutiful small town with colorful houses and friendly people. We will visit the Piedra el Peñol and enormous granite structure towering 200 meters high and 740- step brick staicrcase that takes you to the top. Admire the most spectacular views of mountains and lakes.  Then we will have a wonderful trip by motorboat. Enjoy a typical lunch in Guatapé. In the afternoon we will return to Medellín.

 

                 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”|auto||175px||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

DAY 04: DEPARTURE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Breakfast at the hotel.

Transfer from the hotel to the airport. 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Optional activities:

  • Hacienda Napoles
  • Explora Park
